title: New: The Cribs – Chi-Town
body:
With their first new material since 2009’s Ignore The Ignorant, The Cribs had their new single Chi-Town premiered on Zane Lowe’s BBC earlier this evening.

As to be expected, it’s a raucous slice of indie-rock, all centered around a killer chorus and Ryan Jarman’s unique vocals. The Cribs fifth studio album _In The Belly Of The Brazen Bull_ will be released on 7 May, with David Fridman and Steve Albini on production duties. Check out Chi-Town below, and the tracklisting below that.

_Glitters Like Gold_  
_Come On Be A No-One_  
_Jaded Youth_  
_Anna_  
_Confident Men_  
_Uptight_  
_Chi-Town_  
_Pure O_  
_Back To The Bolthole_  
_I Should Have Helped_  
_Stalagmites_  
_Like A Gift Giver_  
_Butterflies_  
_Arena Rock Encore With Full Cast_
